products.title: DUNK LOW 'BLACK WHITE'
products.description: The Dunk Low 'Black White' brings a classic two-tone look to its classic basketball construction. The shoe's low-top build emerges in leather, with a white base contrasted by black overlays, with further black on the Swoosh branding. Perforations on the toe box provide breathability, while underfoot, the two-tone look is matched by the tooling, which incorporates a concentric rubber outsole for traction.

products.title: AIR JORDAN 1 RETRO HIGH OG 'PATENT BRED'
products.description: Featuring a classic mix of hues, the Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Patent Bred' also sports an elevated construction. Built entirely with patent leather, the shoe's upper appears in a familiar mix of black and Varsity Red, with perforations on the toe box offering breathability. Underfoot, a white Air midsole provides cushioning and contrast, giving way to a Varsity Red finish on the concentric rubber outsole, which is included for traction.

products.title: AIR JORDAN 11 RETRO 'COOL GREY' 2021
products.description: Released in December 2021, the Air Jordan 11 Retro 'Cool Grey' 2021 brings back a colorway from 2001 and 2010. Faithful to the OG, the shoe's upper is built with leather, finished in grey and supported by a darker grey patent leather mudguard. Tonal webbing eyelets are worked into the lacing system to secure the fit, while underfoot, a contrasting white phylon midsole houses full-length Air for cushioning, with a carbon fiber plate included for added support. An icy translucent rubber outsole provides traction.

products.title: AIR JORDAN 4 RETRO 'RED THUNDER'
products.description: Recalling the 'Thunder' colorway, the Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Red Thunder', also known as 'Crimson', emerges with similar color-blocking, albeit in a different mix of hues. The shoe's upper is built with a black nubuck base, highlighted by red throughout, including on the molded eyelets and quarter panel. More red marks the midsole, which includes visible Air for cushioning, while a two-tone rubber outsole is included for traction.

products.title: AIR JORDAN 1 RETRO HIGH OG 'DARK MOCHA'
products.description: Featuring a look similar to Travis Scott's 2019 Air Jordan 1 collaboration, the Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Dark Mocha' released in October 2020. The shoe's upper is built with leather, sporting a white base overlaid by black leather. The heel and collar incorporate Dark Mocha nubuck, while a nylon tongue and perforations on the toe box maintain the classic aesthetic. Air in the heel of the midsole provides cushioning.

products.title: YEEZY BOOST 350 V2 'BLUE TINY'
products.description: The Yeezy Boost 350 V2 'Blue Tint' features a white and grey upper with a red ‘SPLY-350’ txt on the side. It also arrives with blue laces, inner lining, and heel tab. This Yeezy dropped in December 2017 shortly after the Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Beluga 2.0.'
